Summary: very bright white light in sky fades and reappears, until it finally disappears for good.
divs: sighting detailsit was around 845 last night i was taking a walk with my friend. we were looking and the sky and saw a very bright light, assumed it to be a planet. we got back to our apartments and looked at the "star" again. as soon as we commented how bright it was it faded away. it then dimmed back on. it was so bright, too bright to be a planet we thought, it was white light like a star\plane light. we decided to sit down and watch it. it appeared to stay stationary but we were not observing close enough to see if it was moving. we later thought it would have moved lower in the night sky if it was moving (slowly!) finally after about 15 minutes if faded away again! we sat for about 5 more minutes but it never came back. i enjoyed watching it! i'm curious to what it is.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kutztown
There were no other sightings in Kutztown on or around May 3rd 2010
